prev_next.label: Prev / Next product
prev_next.comment: Prev / Next product links on product details page

top_links.label: Hide Default Top Links
top_links.comment: Links in the header: Account, Wishlist, Log In ...

logo_width.label: Logo width
logo_width.comment: Please specify logo width to adjust logo area. Logo width + padding width should be no more 320 px

fields.logo_padding: translate="label"> Logo padding Please specify logo padding to adjust logo area. Logo width + padding width should be no more 320 px text validate-number validate-number-range number-range-0-320 24 1 1 1

header_mobile.label: Header size in mobile view
header_mobile.comment: Resized header - hide top links and language/current dropdowns on mobile devices

width.label: Main Product Image Width (px)
width.comment:
Max width is 590px.
Recommended width for 2 columns layout is 299px
Recommended width for 3 columns layout is 520px
If width is not specified, default width and height will be used (473 x 473 pixels).

keep_ratio.label: Use aspect ratio for all images
keep_ratio.comment: Use main image aspect ration throughout the site

big_image_height.label: Image Height After Zooming (px)
big_image_height.comment: Leave empty to keep aspect ratio of the image

tint_color.label: Tint color
tint_color.comment: color which will cover the main image. (e.g. #ededed). Does not work with Soft Focus.

soft_focus.label: Soft Focus
soft_focus.comment: Applies a subtle blur effect to the main image. Does not work with tint.

smooth_move.label: Smooth Move
smooth_move.comment: Amount of smoothness/drift of the zoom image as it moves. The higher the number, the smoother/more drifty the movement will be. 1 = no smoothing.

products_per_row.label: Num of products per row
products_per_row.comment: These values used for 1024px wide screen. If you have larger screen - number of products will be automatically increased.

product_img_width.label: Product image width
product_img_width.comment: Max product image width in listing mode.

toolbar_bottom.label: Show bottom toolbar
toolbar_bottom.comment: Toolbar with sort, view mode, pager...

grid_cart.label: Add to cart button
grid_cart.comment:
Show / hide add to cart button under product price.
NOTE: Action buttons will be hidden if cart button is visible.
Action buttons settings will be ignored.

hover_actions.label: Action buttons
hover_actions.comment: Show "Add to cart", "Wishlist", "Compare" buttons on hover

hover_image.label: Status
hover_image.comment: Show additional image on mouse hover.

hover_image_col.label: Additional image column
hover_image_col.comment: Select field to use for additional image: product label or sort position

hover_image_label.label: Column value
hover_image_label.comment: Specify image label value or sort value which marks additional images.

second_price.label: Hide bottom price for configurable products

reviews.label: Number of reviews on product page

social.label: Social block
social.comment: Facebook like button, pinterest button, Twitter

related_col.label: Related slider columns
related_col.comment: These values used for 1024px wide screen. If you have larger screen - number of products will be automatically increased.

upsell_col.label: Upsell slider columns
upsell_col.comment: These values used for 1024px wide screen. If you have larger screen - number of products will be automatically increased.

banner_autoscroll.label: Autoscroll
banner_autoscroll.comment: Set to 0 to disable autoscroll</br> Set to 1-10 to enable autoscroll ( scroll timeout - autoscroll * 1000ms )

banner_rewind.label: Slide to first item
banner_rewind.comment: Slide to first item or stop at last item

product_autoscroll.label: Autoscroll
product_autoscroll.comment: Set to 0 to disable autoscroll</br> Set to 1-10 to enable autoscroll ( scroll timeout - autoscroll * 1000ms )

product_rewind.label: Slide to first item
product_rewind.comment: Slide to first item or stop at last item

font.label: Main Font:
font.comment: Enable google font to use this option

button_bg_color.label: Button background color:
button_bg_color.comment: Leave empty to use main color

inverted_button_icons.label: Inverted Button Icon color
inverted_button_icons.comment: Inverted button use hover colors as regular and vice versa

title_font.label: Title Font:
title_font.comment: Enable google font to use this option. Leave empty to use main font

price_font.label: Price Font:
price_font.comment: Enable google font to use this option. Leave empty to use main font

price_text_color.label: Price Text color:
price_text_color.comment: Text in price block ( As low, From, To )

new_price_color.label: New products price color:
new_price_color.comment: Also used as product label background

sale_price_color.label: On Sale products price color:
sale_price_color.comment: Also used as product label background

logo_bg.label: Logo background color:
logo_bg.comment: Leave empty to use main color

top_bar_hover_bg_color.label: Top bar text hover background color:
top_bar_hover_bg_color.comment: Leave empty to use main color

top_bar_cart_hover_bg_color.label: Cart button text hover background color:
top_bar_cart_hover_bg_color.comment: Leave empty to use main color

top_dropdown_cart_bg_color.label: Dropdown item background color:
top_dropdown_cart_bg_color.comment: I.e. - products list in cart dropdown

top_dropdown_buttons_bg.label: Dropdown edit / remove buttons background color:

top_dropdown_buttons_icon.label: Dropdown edit / remove buttons Icon color

top_nav_font.label: Navigation Font:
top_nav_font.comment: Enable google font to use this option. Leave empty to use main font

top_nav_hover_bg_color.label: Top level Navigation background color:
top_nav_hover_bg_color.comment: Leave empty to use main theme color

top_nav_font_size.label: Top level Navigation font size:
top_nav_font_size.comment: Top level ONLY Font size in PX

sub_nav_container.label: Sub level Navigation container background color:

sub_nav_hover_color.label: Sub level Navigation link hover color:

sub_nav_hover_bg_color.label: Sub level Navigation link hover background color:

content_banner_font.label: Banner Font:
content_banner_font.comment: Enable google font to use this option. Leave empty to use main font

content_border_bg.label: Content border color:
content_border_bg.comment: Sliders border, border between items etc

footer_title_font.label: Footer Title Font:
footer_title_font.comment: Enable google font to use this option. Leave empty to use main font

block_border.label: Block top border color:
block_border.comment: Leave empty to use main color

block_items_border.label: Block items border color:
block_items_border.comment: Items divider ( wishlist, checkout progress etc )

block_title_font.label: Block title font:
block_title_font.comment: Enable google font to use this option. Leave empty to use main font

button_bg_color.label: Button background color:
button_bg_color.comment: Leave empty to use main color

product_name_font.label: Product Name Font:
product_name_font.comment: Enable google font to use this option. Leave empty to use main font

title_font.label: Title Font:
title_font.comment: Enable google font to use this option

price_font.label: Price Font:
price_font.comment: Enable google font to use this option. Leave empty to use main font

price_text_color.label: Price Text color:
price_text_color.comment: Text in price block ( As low, From, To )

button_bg_color.label: Button background color:
button_bg_color.comment: Leave empty to use main color

override_css.label: Enable custom css
override_css.comment: Enable this option to load "override.css" file in which you can override the default styling of the theme. To create "override.css" you can use the file "default.override.css" which is located in skin/frontend/athlete/default/css directory.

brands.label: Show All Brands
brands.comment: Yes - show all brands, No - brands which has at least one active product

image_width.label: Brand Image Width (in px)
image_width.comment: Default width is 96px. Max width is 320px

retina.label: Enable Retina image for Brands
retina.comment:
Please note that you will need to upload retina image for each brand image.
It should be twice as large as original image.

Example:
for brand "Adidas" you have to upload:
adidas.png - regular image
adidas_2x.png - retina image

brand_autoscroll.label: Autoscroll
brand_autoscroll.comment: Set to 0 to disable autoscroll</br> Set to 1-10 to enable autoscroll ( scroll timeout - autoscroll * 1000ms )

brand_rewind.label: Slide to first item
brand_rewind.comment: Slide to first item or stop at last item
